name: Animal Lover
description: Evil forces have turned these five hunky beefcake time-displaced boys into animals! You've got to help cure them and maybe even fall in love! Mystery! Intrigue! Romance! No furries, despite the title! A dating sim by Wilson Taylor, Maia Gross and Travis Tohill.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card Storage: 1 GB available space
